name: shortLeg
text: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It has shorter legs. It can not work as hard as others, but it is kind of cute so will make me happier

name: moreHuman
text: A spaceship flied pass and I caught it
option1ResultText: You get some more human. But they don't like the life here and somehow make all human less efficient. Weird.
option2ResultText: Haha, their faces are funny when I put them in my mouth.

name: shortLegDiscrimination
text: The short leg human are discrimated by other human. They think the short ones are not "nature"
option1ResultText: The ones with the shorter legs are not good at fighting. Some get killed during the battle.
option2Text: Kill the leader of the "nature" human
column12: The battle stopped immediately. Another peaceful day on the planet.

name: tentacleArm
text: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It has tentacle arm. It does not work as good as arms it used to have, but hey these tentacles make it looks more like my specy
option2ResultText: Like me or not, if it can not work I don't want it.

name: pincerArm
text: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It has a pincer arm… Might be a good help as a cook but I think the shape is quite dangerous to my tentacles…
option2ResultText: I don't like that they have pincer, looks dangerous

name: breathWithoutHelmet
text: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It can breath without helmet.
option2ResultText: It looks less cute without helmet

name: pincerAndTentacleBattle
text: the human with pincer and human with tentacle has a battle.
option1ResultText: There is no way tentacle human can win the pincer ones, just like paper can't win scissors. Some tentacle human get killed. I don't like this result.

name: pincerWorship
text: human start to worship the ones with pincer

name: pincerWorship2
text: Human start to make some tools similar to pincer and carry them as accessory.

name: pincerWorship3
text: Human attack you with their tiny pincers.

name: meteoCrash
text: There is a small meteo fly to you.

name: meteoCrash2
text: There is a medium meteo fly to you.

name: meteoCrash2
text: There is a huge meteo fly to you.

name: trade
text: A spaceship passed and the one on the ship is interested to your human. He want to exchange some of his collection with you.

name: hasPet
text: Funny, those little humans start to raise their own pets
option1ResultText: Might not be a bad idea to let them keep some small hobbies.

name: hasPet2
text: The human start to train their pets to work. Hmm.

name: tentacleWorship
text: human start to worship the ones with tentacle
option1ResultText: Human worship tentacle and think you are their god and create them. I like this result, especially the part that they are working harder now.

name: tentacleWorship2
text: Human start to make some tentacle stickers and put on themselves. The tentacle clothes become a new fashion in human.

name: tentacleWorship3
text: Human treat those with tentacle arms like noble. One of the tentacle human even said he is the king and the representative of god, namely me.

name: tentacleWorship4
text: Human are oppressed by the tentacle king and start to resist him.

name: tentacleWorship5
text: Human start to think, since they can kill tentacle king, they can kill you too…

name: tentacleWorship5_2
text: Tentacle king thinks he is not just the representative, but the god itself, he start to conspiracy to kill you.

name: tentacleWorship5_3
text: Tentacle king decides to do human sacrifice every day to maintain his rule.
